Flow.description: The Purpose of this flow is to update milestone completion date based on status [17/01/2025] - Development untuk reporting SLA OLA [22/01/2025] - Development untuk Reporting SLA OLA status Returned [23/01/2025] - Development untuk penggantian Case Type [9/02/2025] - Development untuk penambahan Waiting Docs dan Agent OLA

formulas.name: INTwaktuPenyelesaianWaitingDoc
formulas.expression: DATETIMEVALUE( MID({!tanggalPenyelesaianWaitingDocVar}, 7, 4) & "-" & MID({!tanggalPenyelesaianWaitingDocVar}, 4, 2) & "-" & LEFT({!tanggalPenyelesaianWaitingDocVar}, 2) & " " & MID({!tanggalPenyelesaianWaitingDocVar}, 12, 8) ) - DATETIMEVALUE( MID({!tanggal_penyelesaian_agentOLA_formula}, 7, 4) & "-" & MID({!tanggal_penyelesaian_agentOLA_formula}, 4, 2) & "-" & LEFT({!tanggal_penyelesaian_agentOLA_formula}, 2) & " " & MID({!tanggal_penyelesaian_agentOLA_formula}, 12, 8) )

formulas.name: waktu_penyelesaian_1_formula
formulas.expression: IF( {!sumLevel1} >= 1440, TEXT(FLOOR({!sumLevel1} / 1440)) & " hari " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD({!sumLevel1}, 1440) / 60)) & " jam " & TEXT(MOD({!sumLevel1}, 60)) & " menit", IF( {!sumLevel1} >= 60, TEXT(FLOOR({!sumLevel1} / 60)) & " jam " & TEXT(MOD({!sumLevel1}, 60)) & " menit", TEXT({!sumLevel1}) & " menit" ) )

formulas.name: waktu_penyelesaian_2_formula
formulas.expression: IF( {!sumLevel2} >= 1440, TEXT(FLOOR({!sumLevel2} / 1440)) & " hari " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD({!sumLevel2}, 1440) / 60)) & " jam " & TEXT(MOD({!sumLevel2}, 60)) & " menit", IF( {!sumLevel2} >= 60, TEXT(FLOOR({!sumLevel2} / 60)) & " jam " & TEXT(MOD({!sumLevel2}, 60)) & " menit", TEXT({!sumLevel2}) & " menit" ) )

formulas.name: waktu_penyelesaian_3_formula
formulas.expression: IF( {!sumLevel3} >= 1440, TEXT(FLOOR({!sumLevel3} / 1440)) & " hari " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD({!sumLevel3}, 1440) / 60)) & " jam " & TEXT(MOD({!sumLevel3}, 60)) & " menit", IF( {!sumLevel3} >= 60, TEXT(FLOOR({!sumLevel3} / 60)) & " jam " & TEXT(MOD({!sumLevel3}, 60)) & " menit", TEXT({!sumLevel3}) & " menit" ) )

formulas.name: waktu_penyelesaian_agentOLA_formula
formulas.expression: IF( {!sumAgentOla} >= 1440, TEXT(FLOOR({!sumAgentOla} / 1440)) & " hari " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD({!sumAgentOla}, 1440) / 60)) & " jam " & TEXT(MOD({!sumAgentOla}, 60)) & " menit", IF( {!sumAgentOla} >= 60, TEXT(FLOOR({!sumAgentOla} / 60)) & " jam " & TEXT(MOD({!sumAgentOla}, 60)) & " menit", TEXT({!sumAgentOla}) & " menit" ) )

formulas.name: waktu_penyelesaian_all_Level_formula
formulas.expression: IF( {!sumWaktuPenyelesaianAllLevel} >= 1440, TEXT(FLOOR({!sumWaktuPenyelesaianAllLevel} / 1440)) & " hari " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD({!sumWaktuPenyelesaianAllLevel}, 1440) / 60)) & " jam " & TEXT(MOD({!sumWaktuPenyelesaianAllLevel}, 60)) & " menit", IF( {!sumWaktuPenyelesaianAllLevel} >= 60, TEXT(FLOOR({!sumWaktuPenyelesaianAllLevel} / 60)) & " jam " & TEXT(MOD({!sumWaktuPenyelesaianAllLevel}, 60)) & " menit", TEXT({!sumWaktuPenyelesaianAllLevel}) & " menit" ) )

formulas.name: waktu_penyelesaian_formula
formulas.expression: IF( {!Loop_All_Case_Milestone_not_complete.ElapsedTimeInMins} >= 1440, TEXT(FLOOR({!Loop_All_Case_Milestone_not_complete.ElapsedTimeInMins} / 1440)) & " hari " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD({!Loop_All_Case_Milestone_not_complete.ElapsedTimeInMins}, 1440) / 60)) & " jam " & TEXT(MOD({!Loop_All_Case_Milestone_not_complete.ElapsedTimeInMins}, 60)) & " menit", IF( {!Loop_All_Case_Milestone_not_complete.ElapsedTimeInMins} >= 60, TEXT(FLOOR({!Loop_All_Case_Milestone_not_complete.ElapsedTimeInMins} / 60)) & " jam " & TEXT(MOD({!Loop_All_Case_Milestone_not_complete.ElapsedTimeInMins}, 60)) & " menit", TEXT({!Loop_All_Case_Milestone_not_complete.ElapsedTimeInMins}) & " menit" ) )
